Key Match Events: Dallas ended the first half with a huge 65-40 lead
Luka Doncic nearly finished the game with a triple-double with 32 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists
Daniel Gafford nearly notched a double-double with 18 points and eight rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: Thompson finished the game with nine points, five rebounds, four assists, and two blocks
The Mavericks will take on the Indiana Pacers next and will hope to take advantage of their momentum
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson struggled to score with inefficient shooting splits
Doncic was unstoppable in the first half, shooting an accurate 60% from the field
Gafford was unstoppable inside the paint with a steady 69.2% shooting
